name: AudiobookBreakPodcastfromAudioFileMagazine
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Hear classic audiobooks chapter by chapter. In collaboration with audio publishers and professional narrators, AudioFile Magazine serializes extraordinary audiobooks. Twice a week, we bring you new episodes featuring the next chapters in a favorite story; listen throughout the week or catch up on the weekend. Each featured audiobook is brought to life with brilliant performances and produced with the highest audio standards. It's a wonderful way to take a break—an audiobook break.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
